name: Gnaphalium

Abdomen: Colic; pain in various parts of the abdomen
First stage of cholera infantum; vomiting and purging
Back: Chronic backache in lumbar region; better resting on back
Lumbago with numbness in lower part of back and weight in pelvis
Female: Dysmenorrhoea, with scanty and painful menses
Extremities: Intense pain along the sciatic nerve; numbness alternates with pain
Better, drawing limbs up, flexing thigh on abdomen
Cramps in calves of legs and feet when in bed
Frequent pains in calves and feet
Rheumatic pain in ankle joints and legs
Chronic muscular rheumatism of back and neck
Pain in joints as if they lacked oil
Face: Intermittent pains of superior maxillary of both sides

details: A remedy of unquestioned benefit in sciatica, when pain is associated with NUMBNESS of the part affected. Rheumatism and morning diarrhoea. Polyuria.
